bibdata.title: Draft Standard for Minimum Performance Characteristics of IEEE P802.20 Terminals and Base Stations/Access Nodes
Draft Standard for Minimum Performance Characteristics of IEEE P802.20 Terminals and Base Stations/Access Nodes
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std P802.20.3/D2.2, Oct 2009

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard specifies minimum performance parameters and the associated test methodologies for implementation of 802.20 compliant systems.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
